00024 #include "BuildConstraintConstructs.h"
00025 
00026 using namespace BuildCon;
00027 
00028 // These two defines just work around a bug in some compilers.
00029 #define MERGE(x,y) MERGE2(x,y)
00030 #define MERGE2(x,y) x ## y
00031 
00032 #define TERMINATE_BUILDCON3(CT_NAME) \
00033 namespace BuildCon \
00034 { \
00035 template<> \
00036 struct BuildConObj<CT_NAME, 0> \
00037 { \
00038   template<typename T1, typename T2, typename T3> \
00039   static  \
00040   AbstractConstraint* build(StateObj* stateObj, const pair<pair<pair<EmptyType, vector<T1>* >, vector<T2>* >, vector<T3>*>& vars, ConstraintBlob& b, int) \
00041   { \
00042       return Build ## CT_NAME(stateObj, *(vars.first.first.second), *(vars.first.second), *(vars.second), b); \
00043   } \
00044 }; \
00045 } \
00046 
00047 #define TERMINATE_BUILDCON2(CT_NAME) \
00048 namespace BuildCon \
00049 { \
00050 template<> \
00051 struct BuildConObj<CT_NAME, 0> \
00052 { \
00053   template<typename T1, typename T2> \
00054   static  \
00055   AbstractConstraint* build(StateObj* stateObj, const pair<pair<EmptyType, vector<T1>* >, vector<T2>* >& vars, ConstraintBlob& b, int) \
00056   { \
00057       return Build ## CT_NAME(stateObj, *(vars.first.second), *(vars.second), b); \
00058   } \
00059 }; \
00060 } \
00061 
00062 #define TERMINATE_BUILDCON1(CT_NAME) \
00063 namespace BuildCon \
00064 { \
00065 template<> \
00066 struct BuildConObj<CT_NAME, 0> \
00067 { \
00068   template<typename T1> \
00069   static  \
00070   AbstractConstraint* build(StateObj* stateObj, const pair<EmptyType, vector<T1>* >& vars, ConstraintBlob& b, int) \
00071   { \
00072       return Build ## CT_NAME(stateObj, *(vars.second), b); \
00073   } \
00074 }; \
00075 } \
00076 
00077 #define TERMINATE_BUILDCON0(CT_NAME) \
00078 namespace BuildCon \
00079 { \
00080 template<> \
00081 struct BuildConObj<CT_NAME, 0> \
00082 { \
00083   static  \
00084   AbstractConstraint* build(StateObj* stateObj, const EmptyType& vars, ConstraintBlob& b, int) \
00085   { \
00086       return Build ## CT_NAME(stateObj, b); \
00087   } \
00088 }; \
00089 } \
00090 
00091 #define BUILD_CT(CT_NAME,COUNT) \
00092 MERGE(TERMINATE_BUILDCON, COUNT)(CT_NAME) \
00093 AbstractConstraint* \
00094 build_constraint_ ## CT_NAME(StateObj* stateObj, ConstraintBlob& b) \
00095 { return BuildConObj<CT_NAME, COUNT>::build(stateObj, EmptyType(), b, 0); }
